alert.note: Alert for City and Borough of Yakutat (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 20 at 3:52AM AKST until December 21 at 7:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 7 AM AKST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 9 inches. * WHERE...City and Borough of Yakutat. * WHEN...From noon Tuesday to 7 AM AKST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...There is some uncertainty in exactly where the narrow band of heavy snow will develop. For now, greatest snow amounts look to fall between Icy Bay and Yakutat. This being said, amounts could vary greatly over short distances leading to Yakutat potentially seeing more snow.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
